K_{{\mathbf{a}}^q, I^{[q]}} = \frac{K_{{\mathbf{a}}^q} + I^{[q]} R^d}{I^{[q]} R^d} \subseteq \frac{((J^{[q]})^* + I^{[q]})R^d}{I^{[q]}R^d} \subseteq \frac{((I+J)^{[q]})^* R^d}{I^{[q]}R^d}.
\]
